content.en: Prostate cancer prediction: Researchers are exploring the use of algorithms and machine learning to predict the aggressiveness of prostate cancer. By analyzing MRI scans and using radiomics-based models, machine learning algorithms can differentiate between different types of prostate cancer and assess their aggressiveness. These algorithms can also improve the detection of prostate cancer in lesions and predict important factors such as the Gleason score.
content.da: Forudsigelse af prostatakræft: Forskere undersøger brugen af algoritmer og maskinlæring til at forudsige aggressiviteten af prostatakræft. Ved at analysere MRI-scanninger og bruge radiomik-baserede modeller, kan maskinlæringsalgoritmer skelne mellem forskellige typer af prostatakræft og vurdere deres aggressivitet. Disse algoritmer kan også forbedre detektion af prostatakræft i læsioner og forudsige vigtige faktorer som Gleason score.
